data.message: I like the one you did last year better I don't like this years you have to push the page up last years had music on and just went smoothly it was so much better than this years take a look back on 2014!!!!!!please change it back!!!!!!!

replies.message: Hey Connie. We're sorry to hear that. We are always looking at new ways for people to connect, interact, and share with their friends on Facebook. This year, we created a more interactive experience that's also optimized for mobile. -Hailey
Yea and last years had statuses in it too, this one only has pics:(

Actually, it was the only thing I was looking forward to at years end. The videos from last year with the music were fantastic. The photos I've seen so far are not that compelling, particularly if they are not customized. Really, Uses should have the choice of doing a video or having just the photo review.
